EmailTemplate.name: 07.1 - Ready for Pickup Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow Up to Confirm Delivery is Scheduled for PO - {!PurchaseOrder_LineItem__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Phunions,
A Purchase Order for {!Order.Account_Name__c} , Invoice {!Order.Invoice_Number__c} is ready for pickup from . Operations Team, please schedule pickup from the vendor and communicate with the Operations Manager if needed. Sales Team, please communicate any special notes or requests with the Operations Team.
{!PurchaseOrder_LineItem__c.Link}
Thanks, Ralph the Rooster
